docs.abstract: Nivea, again accused of racial insensitivity, halted a campaign promoting its Invisible For Black & White deodorant.
docs.snippet: Nivea, again accused of racial insensitivity, halted a campaign promoting its Invisible For Black & White deodorant.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON — The skin care brand Nivea set off a controversy this week with an ad featuring the phrase “White is purity,” again finding itself accused of racial insensitivity over a campaign that seemed to be embraced by white supremacists.

headline.main: Nivea Pulls ‘White Is Purity’ Ad After Online Uproar
headline.print_headline: Nivea Pulls ‘White Is Purity’ Ad After Online Uproar

docs.abstract: Conservatives like Ms. Coulter are eagerly throwing themselves into volatile situations on college campuses, inspired by a backlash against political correctness.
docs.snippet: Conservatives like Ms. Coulter are eagerly throwing themselves into volatile situations on college campuses, inspired by a backlash against political correctness.
docs.lead_paragraph: Without uttering a word to students at the University of California, Berkeley, Ann Coulter on Wednesday made herself the latest cause célèbre in the rapidly escalating effort by conservatives to fight liberals on what was once the left’s moral high ground over free speech on campus.

headline.main: In Ann Coulter’s Speech Battle, Signs That Conservatives Are Emboldened
headline.print_headline: In Coulter’s Free Speech Battle, The Right’s Latest Rallying Cry

docs.abstract: James Forman Jr. examines how people, acting with the best intentions, could create a problem even more devastating than the one they were trying to solve.
docs.snippet: James Forman Jr. examines how people, acting with the best intentions, could create a problem even more devastating than the one they were trying to solve.

docs.abstract: Alarmed by a plan to turn the former home of this American writer into apartments, a group dedicated to building a writers’ retreat runs afoul of the Baldwin family.
docs.snippet: Alarmed by a plan to turn the former home of this American writer into apartments, a group dedicated to building a writers’ retreat runs afoul of the Baldwin family.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAINT-PAUL-DE-VENCE, France — From 1970 until his death in 1987, James Baldwin lived and wrote in a house with an idyllic garden in this medieval village on the Côte d’Azur, with the Alps at its back and the Mediterranean visible far below.

headline.main: Battling to Save James Baldwin’s Home in the South of France

docs.abstract: Want to instigate change? Form or join a club, know the issues, gather money and allies, and exercise your political muscle.
docs.snippet: Want to instigate change? Form or join a club, know the issues, gather money and allies, and exercise your political muscle.
docs.lead_paragraph: Last year, the RAND Survey Research Group asked 3,037 Americans about their political preferences and found that the factor that best predicted support for Donald Trump wasn’t age, race, gender, income, educational attainment or attitudes toward Muslims or undocumented immigrants. It was whether respondents agreed with the statement “People like me don’t have any say about what the government does.”

headline.main: A How-to Book for Wielding Civic Power

docs.abstract: The beverage company apologized for an ad featuring Kendall Jenner giving a smiling officer a soda at a protest.
docs.snippet: The beverage company apologized for an ad featuring Kendall Jenner giving a smiling officer a soda at a protest.
docs.lead_paragraph: Pepsi has apologized for a controversial advertisement that borrowed imagery from the Black Lives Matter movement, after a day of intense criticism from people who said it trivialized the widespread protests against the killings of black people by the police.

headline.main: Pepsi Pulls Ad Accused of Trivializing Black Lives Matter
headline.print_headline: Pepsi Drops Ad Accused of Trivializing Protesters
